description: Creates an application. Applications are an Amazon AppStream 2.0 resource that stores the details about how to launch applications on Elastic fleet streaming instances. An application consists of the launch details, icon, and display name. Applications are associated with an app block that contains the application binaries and other files. The applications assigned to an Elastic fleet are the applications users can launch. This is only supported for Elastic fleets.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the application. This name is visible to users when display name is not specified.

parameters.name: IconS3Location
parameters.description: The location in S3 of the application icon. The S3 bucket of the S3 object. S3Key (string) --- The S3 key of the S3 object. This is required when used for the following: IconS3Location (Actions: CreateApplication and UpdateApplication) SessionScriptS3Location (Actions: CreateFleet and UpdateFleet) ScriptDetails (Actions: CreateAppBlock) SourceS3Location when creating an app block with CUSTOM PackagingType (Actions: CreateAppBlock) SourceS3Location when creating an app block with APPSTREAM2 PackagingType, and using an existing application package (VHD file). In this case, S3Key refers to the VHD file. If a new application package is required, then S3Key is not required. (Actions: CreateAppBlock)

nested_params.name: S3Bucket
nested_params.description: The S3 bucket of the S3 object.

nested_params.name: S3Key
nested_params.description: The S3 key of the S3 object. This is required when used for the following:

parameters.name: LaunchPath
parameters.description: The launch path of the application.

parameters.name: Platforms
parameters.description: The platforms the application supports. WINDOWS_SERVER_2019 and AMAZON_LINUX2 are supported for Elastic fleets. (string) ---

parameters.name: InstanceFamilies
parameters.description: The instance families the application supports. Valid values are GENERAL_PURPOSE and GRAPHICS_G4. (string) ---

parameters.name: AppBlockArn
parameters.description: The app block ARN to which the application should be associated.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags assigned to the application. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: Application
nested_items.description: Describes an application in the application catalog.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the application.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The application name to display.

nested_items.name: IconURL
nested_items.description: The URL for the application icon. This URL might be time-limited.

nested_items.name: LaunchPath
nested_items.description: The path to the application executable in the instance.

nested_items.name: LaunchParameters
nested_items.description: The arguments that are passed to the application at launch.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: If there is a problem, the application can be disabled after image creation.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: WorkingDirectory
nested_items.description: The working directory for the application.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the application.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the application.

nested_items.name: AppBlockArn
nested_items.description: The app block ARN of the application.

nested_items.name: IconS3Location
nested_items.description: The S3 location of the application icon.

nested_items.name: S3Bucket
nested_items.description: The S3 bucket of the S3 object.

nested_items.name: S3Key
nested_items.description: The S3 key of the S3 object.
SourceS3Location when creating an app block with CUSTOM PackagingType (Actions: CreateAppBlock)

SourceS3Location when creating an app block with APPSTREAM2 PackagingType, and using an existing application package (VHD file). In this case, S3Key refers to the VHD file. If a new application package is required, then S3Key is not required. (Actions: CreateAppBlock)

nested_items.name: Platforms
nested_items.description: The platforms on which the application can run.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: InstanceFamilies
nested_items.description: The instance families for the application.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the application was created within the app block.
